backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores a Google Sheets CSV export URL, fetches its CSV content via HTTP outcalls, and exposes query/update methods to get, set, validate, and fetch the sheet data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the SheetViewer row hover highlight was fixed for mobile touch devices using a React state-driven onClick approach in SheetViewer.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a build/documentation reference for the project's frontend components.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors for backgrounds, cards, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app, setting viewport meta, the page title 'Google Sheets Viewer', and mounting the app into a root div via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with two routes: '/' rendering SheetViewer and '/admin' rendering AdminPanel.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor or identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and identity persistence with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping all backend actor calls: checking validity, getting/setting the Google Sheets URL, fetching CSV data, and refreshing the cached sheet data.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Inter/DM Sans fonts, defining a green/white OKLCH color palette with custom sheet and success tokens, and preventing horizontal overflow on mobile via max-width and overflow-x rules.
frontend/src/lib/csvParser.ts: Utility that parses a CSV string into a structured object with headers and rows, correctly handling quoted fields containing commas and embedded newlines.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that renders the app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page at /admin route that allows the site owner to view/set the Google Sheets URL and manually trigger a data refresh, displaying success/error feedback for each action.
frontend/src/pages/SheetViewer.tsx: Public read-only page that fetches cached Google Sheets CSV data, parses it, and renders it in a scrollable table with alternating row shading, row hover highlighting, and a refresh button.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Inter, DM Sans), OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius variables, box shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state (version 13), summarizing the app's purpose, architectural decisions, known issues (e.g., row hover highlight not working on mobile), and a list of implemented features.
